snippet.title: VICE NDRCVR - Official World Premiere Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Get ready to take on the role of an undercover agent in the '80s, busting drug smugglers in Miami in the upcoming VICE NDRCVR game. You'll be hacking into a computer OS that gives off Microsoft vibes from the mid to late '80s, and will be able to make your own choices along the way. '80s synth music and neon colors splash the screen to bring you deeper into the decade. VICE NDRCVR will be available on Steam, with a release date TBD.

#IGN #IGNSummerofGaming
